page.title: 17RECREATION
page.content: { {Barker Butts Rugby Football Club, } Pickford Grange Lane. Colours royal blue & gold shirts.5 senior teams,5 mini rugby & 4jnr teams. Warwicks. champions 1983/4 & 84/85. Club also organises social & family activities e.g.cricket,indoor bowls, dances and barbecues. Other{social activities in Eastern {Green}include Cubs, Scouts,Brownies, Guides,Youth Club. The ladies may be_ long to The Womens Institute, Mothers Union,the senior citizens enjoy The Golden Years Club or the Luncheon Club for the disabled. There is a recreation field in Church Lane & a grass play area in Sutton Ave. In{Berkswell}children may belong to Brownies, Giudes, Cubs, & Scouts.
